name: NCKU Portable Schedule
body:
### About 
This is an application write in swift. It can automatically capture the course data from school course catalog and save on your iPhone. With this, you can have your own daily course schedule in your pocket.

### Data source
All the data is from the [NCKU course catalog](http://course-query.acad.ncku.edu.tw/qry/) instantly when you add.

### Change log
* 2015-07-09 Start the Project

### Authors and Contributors
Yu-Hsun,Lee (@andylee830914)

### Support or Contact

contact me : <andylee0914.tw@gmail.com>
